text: Kaigan no machi (no hitobito) ni tsuite, kare-ra ni toe. Kare-ra ga ansokujitsu (no kin) o yabutta toki no koto o, gyogun wa kare-ra no ansokujitsu ni minamo ni araware yattekite ita. Daga kare-ra ga ansokujitsu no kin o mamoranakatta toki wa, sorera wa yattekonaku nattade wanai ka. Ko no y≈ç ni ware wa kare-ra o kokoromita. Kare-ra ga omo no okite ni somuite ita tamedearu
